name: Dell - Configure DCU
description: Run Dell Command Update - Limit the Updates to the boxes below. If you uncheck all boxes, then it will update everything it finds. Example, to limit updates to drivers, check the drivers box.

versions.description:
Configures 

Example, to limit updates to drivers, check the drivers box.

options.name: ScriptName
options.description: DellCommandUpdateSettings.ps1

options.name: Content
options.description: Content

options.name: scheduleAction
options.description: Pick what the automatic updater will do... many of the options below will require DownloadInstallAndNotify

options.name: schedule
options.description: Schedule when the Dell Command Update updater runs updates automatically.

dropdownOptions.displayName: Monthly (set week, day and time below)

options.name: delayDays
options.displayName: Days to delay updates from being available when released from Dell
options.description: select the amount of days to wait until an update from dell is available for the system to install.

options.name: scheduleDaily
options.displayName: Time of day:  [00:00(24 hour  format, 15 minutes  increment)]:
options.description: choose the time of day to invoke the updates

options.name: scheduleWeekly
options.description: choose the day of the week invoke the updates

options.name: scheduleMonthly
options.description: choose the week of the month invoke the updates

options.name: installationDeferral
options.description: enable or disable deferral install options

options.name: deferralInstallInterval
options.description: set the hours that the deferal will last until re-prompted to install updates

options.name: deferralInstallCount
options.description: how many times the user can defer the updates

options.name: systemRestartDeferral
options.description: Enable or Disable the abilty to defer the restart

options.name: deferralRestartCount
options.description: Number of times user can defer the restart when Restart Deferrals are Enabled

options.name: deferralRestartInterval
options.description: Set the hours for each time the Restart is Defered when Restart Deferrals are Enabled

options.name: updateDeviceCategoryFilter
options.displayName: Filter Updates by Device Category [Disable = No filtering, aka get all categories of updates]
options.description: Enables the ability to filter based on Category, must select options below when enabled.

options.name: updateDeviceCategoryAudio
options.description: Include Audio drivers for auto updates.

options.name: updateDeviceCategoryVideo
options.description: Include Videodrivers for auto updates.

options.name: updateDeviceCategoryNetwork
options.description: Include Networkdrivers for auto updates.

options.name: updateDeviceCategoryStorage
options.description: Include Storage drivers for auto updates.

options.name: updateDeviceCategoryInput
options.description: Include Input drivers for auto updates.

options.name: updateDeviceCategoryChipset
options.description: Include Chipset drivers for auto updates.

options.name: updateDeviceCategoryOthers
options.description: Include Other drivers for auto updates.

options.name: updateSeverityFilter
options.displayName: Filter Updates by Severity [Disable = No filtering, aka get all Severities of updates]
options.description: Enables the ability to filter based on Severity, must select options below when enabled.

options.name: updateSeveritySecurity
options.description: Include Severity Security for auto updates.

options.name: updateSeverityCritical
options.description: Include Severity Critical drivers for auto updates.

options.name: updateSeverityRecommended
options.description: Include Severity Recommended drivers for auto updates.

options.name: updateSeverityOptional
options.description: Include Severity Optional drivers for auto updates.

options.name: updateTypeFilter
options.displayName: Filter Updates by Type [Disable = No filtering, aka get all types of updates]
options.description: Enables the ability to filter based on Type, must select options below when enabled.

options.name: updateTypeBIOS
options.description: Include Type BIOS for auto updates.

options.name: updateTypeFirmware
options.description: Include Type Firmware for auto updates.

options.name: updateTypeDriver
options.description: Include Type Driver for auto updates.

options.name: updateTypeApplication
options.description: Include Type Application for auto updates.

options.name: updateTypeUtility
options.description: Include Type Utility Applications for auto updates.

options.name: updateTypeOthers
options.description: Include Type Others for auto updates.
